fortiview-unscanned-apps.help: Enable/disable showing unscanned traffic in FortiView application charts.
fortiview-unscanned-apps.name: fortiview-unscanned-apps

resolve-apps.help: Resolve unknown applications on the GUI using Fortinet's remote application database.
resolve-apps.name: resolve-apps

options.help: Enable unknown applications on the GUI.
options.name: enable

options.help: Disable unknown applications on the GUI.
options.name: disable

resolve-hosts.help: Enable/disable resolving IP addresses to hostname in log messages on the GUI using reverse DNS lookup
resolve-hosts.name: resolve-hosts

options.help: Enable resolving IP addresses to hostnames.
options.name: enable

options.help: Disable resolving IP addresses to hostnames.
options.name: disable

results.help: Configure how log messages are displayed on the GUI.
results.name: gui-display
